entry.title: Post-College Success
entry.content: 2 days ago I posted my take on how to achieve success in the “real world.” I spoke a little bit about my experiences going into college and how my perception of success changed over the years. It can be found at the JOCC blog (http://thelifeofajocc.blogspot.com/2011/05/achieving-success-in-real-worldits-not.html/).

entry.title: The JOCC Blog
entry.content: My friends and I are collaborating on this blog called The Life of a JOCC. Our original intention behind the blog is for us to have a place where we can share our experiences and lessons learned in life. It would be a blog wherein people can relate and share their experiences as well. Through time, we refined this idea and came up with the concept of a JOCC.Â A JOCC basically embodies the core values that my friends and I believe in. We strive to be JOCCs and working on this together is our very own way of expressing the JOCCs within ourselves. On our recent post, we address exactly “What is a JOCC?” Check it out right here!!
